meanings.definition: The quality of being pompous or self-important.
meanings.sent1: Her constant pompousness made it hard for others to enjoy her company.
meanings.sent2: His pompousness was evident in the way he always talked down to everyone.
meanings.sent3: Despite his pompousness, he couldn't even tie his own shoelaces!
meanings.sent4: The pompousness of the peacock as it strutted around the garden was quite amusing.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's pompousness was like a dark cloud hanging over the classroom.

meanings.definition: An instance of being pompous or self-important.
meanings.sent1: The politician's latest pompousness during the speech annoyed many listeners.
meanings.sent2: After his pompousness at the party, no one wanted to invite him again.
meanings.sent3: His pompousness reached new heights when he tried to impress his cat with a fancy hat.
meanings.sent4: The pompousness of the CEO was like a barrier between him and his employees.
meanings.sent5: The pompousness of the king was so extreme that even the palace walls seemed to cringe.
